title: Best Honeymoon Destinations for Singapore Newly Weds
text:
Best Honeymoon Destinations for Singapore Newly Weds February 1 2015 This page comes from the website NetGlobers. It has been printed on 2015-07-29 at 11:09. The original can be found here : . Travel report of Singapore Cleanliness, hygiene, water quality, allergen control... Food safety Getting around, in cities or in the countryside... Is transport safe and reliable? Is public transport frequent? Are taxis easy to find? Transport Finding a safe place to stay, the cleanliness and quality of accomodation... Accomodation Being able to communicate with locals, or get in touch with people at home... And what about phones and internet access? Communication Medical facilities, emergency services, doctors, pharmacies, exotic diseases... Are the hospitals clean and well-staffed? Is it easy to find a doctor, or a pharmacy when you need them? Health care - based on 17 travel reports - by Cole   
One of the hardest decisions for a soon to be married couple is where to spend the honeymoon. Any couple would tell you any part of the world is the best honeymoon destination as long as the two of you can enjoy and relax together. But what are the best of the best honeymoon destinations around the world? Here are places to consider the perfect destination that are near or far from Singapore: 
Bali 
Where else would you spend a relaxing, peaceful, secluded and romantic place than in beaches of Bali. Spend your honeymoon in one of the best-known beach destinations not only in Indonesia but in Asia and take part in the cultures and food traditions of Indonesia. Bali is a place where you truly can find peace and serenity as a couple. 
Thailand 
Adventure. food. and culture. Spend your honeymoon in the heart of Asia. Thailand is known for its jungles, crystal clear waters and amazing street food. Not to mention the affordable accommodations. Thailand is one of the perfect places to go on an adventure themed honeymoon experience. 
Italy 
Everybody knows Italy equates love and romance with its food. Travel back in time and spend your honeymoon in the city where its history and culture is rich with beauty. Italy is the place if you’re looking for delicious food, coffee and pastries. A place where all you do is eat and fall in love together with everything you see and touch. 
Spain 
Spain is a country that is perfect for newly-weds who want to experience the beauty of the Mediterranean. Visit Barcelona for its parties, culture and food. Shop at the Boqueria for great finds and dance your night away to the gracefulness of the flamenco along with the seductive melodies of a Spanish Guitar. 
Paris 
Talk about a European getaway! What better place to spend your love than in the city of love. Take couple selfies at the iconic Eiffel tower. Buy roses from street vendors and explore the stone streets on foot. From its tourist attractions, music, culture up to its language you will surely fall in love with this city’s throwback charm. 
These are just to name a few of the best honeymoon destinations around the world. I’m sure there are travel package deals out there in the web that can help you cross out this part from your bucket list. So book your honeymoon destination as early as you can and start saving for that trip. ...
